briefdescription.para: Sets the script to run with a damage event.

parameterdescription.para: The script that will handle the damage event.
An object if only executing for a specific object or OBJECT_INVALID for global.

simplesect.para: To use only in the Damage Event Script.
To use only in the Damage Event Script.

briefdescription.para: Sets the script to run with an attack event.

parameterdescription.para: The script that will handle the attack event.
An object if only executing for a specific object or OBJECT_INVALID for global.

simplesect.para: To use only in the Attack Event Script.
To use only in the Attack Event Script.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct NWNX_Damage_DamageData data, object oTarget, object oSource=OBJECT_SELF)
memberdef.name: NWNX_Damage_DealDamage

simplesect.para: Permits multiple damage types and checks enhancement bonus for overcoming DR.

parameterdescription.para: The target object on whom the damage is dealt.
